def_cn: (代替某些形容词词尾的 -te，-t,和 -tic，置于形容词后构成名词)表示“状态”，“性质”
def_en: -cy replaces '-te', '-t', and '-tic' at the end of some adjectives to form nouns referring to the state or quality described by the adjective.

def_cn: (用于名词后构成名词)表示“等级”，“职务”
def_en: -cy is added to some nouns referring to people with a particular rank or post in order to form nouns that refer to this rank or post.
